text:
@realDonaldTrump Do you really have the authority to designate a group that does not have a leader, a place to assemble or any known bank accounts, as a terrorist organization?

Sounds like another distraction from Coronavirus, TRYING TO DISTANCE YOURSELF FROM OVER 100,000 DEATHS!
